title: PMS 2.0 264 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, MNF Doubleheader Preview, Darius Butler, Dan Orlovsky, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys break down everything from this past NFL weekend on another overreaction Monday. To do so, they welcome in 9 Year NFL veteran at Defensive Back, co-host of The Man-To-Man Pod, Everything DB, Darius Butler. Darius breaks down tonight's Monday Night Football game's and gives a couple of locks for the over/under of Quarterback passing yards. Plus Darius chats about what he's liked seeing the most so far this NFL season, and what has been bothering so far (19:55-39:55). Next, 12 Year NFL veteran at Quarterback, NFL analyst, and co-host of NFL Live on ESPN, Dan Orlovsky joins the show. Pat and Dan chat about Matt Patricia's veiled shot at Jim Caldwell, whether Patricia is going to stick around in Detroit, his growing feud with Connor, and his thoughts on tonight's games (47:07-1:00:39). Later is another installment of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk as Pat and AJ recap the NFL slate and AJ comes to terms with the fact that the team he chose to win the Super Bowl, the Cowboys, appear to be DEAD
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
